snippet: David Duval won the British Open at Royal Lytham & St. Annes in 2001 and has not won another major championship or a PGA Tour event since.
abstract: David Duval won the British Open at Royal Lytham & St. Annes in 2001 and has not won another major championship or a PGA Tour event since.

headline.main: Returning to Site of Signature Win, Duval Feels Lucky and Blessed
headline.print_headline: His Game Hasn’t Recovered, but Duval Says He’s Fine, Thank You Very Much
